name: Cave Gunk
desc: Just a bit of malodorous residue left on a cave wall. Surprisingly, this is still valuable to some people

name: Copper Nugget
desc: Used by skilled weaponsmiths and armorers make cheap (if not particularly durable) bronze items, copper is both extremely useful and extremely plentiful

name: Lesser Gemstone
desc: Unlike some better RPGs, the gemstones in this game don't actually confer any magical properties. So you might as well just sell it. Still, money!

name: Greater Gemstone
desc: This one's particularly shiny. Also particularly useless. This is a dungeon, not an art show. Sell it and get moving!

name: Wad of Pitch
desc: This black substance is useful in sealing holes. Shipwrights find it particularly essential, as it fills the spaces between wooden boards.

name: Ectoplasmic Residue
desc: The remains of a banished spirit. Useful to the thaumaturgically-inclined

name: Unidentified Tooth
desc: The tooth of some beast. You're not sure why someone would want this, but apparently some people do.

name: Unidentified Claw
desc: The claw of some beast. Whatever it is, you're glad you found only its tooth.
